name: WorKing simulator (HTC Vive)
description:
WorKing Simulator is a school project of a 3rd years Game Designer team of students. 

It's a VR game for HTC Vive. Your goal is to be the best employee of your compagny. To achieve this purpose you have to collect points. You can earn them by ... working !
But your co-workers have the same goal ! To prevent them to become the best employee you can disrupt their work.
But beware, your boss is watching !
